attributes.action: Ensure that no bonuses are paid to RBS bankers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Royal Bank of Scotland is planning to pay millions in bonuses to its senior bankers and traders to, "Ensure we keep our best people." If they were that good then the taxpayer would not be the majority shareholder of RBS.

Show some backbone Prime Minister and stop these payments. They are simply not deserved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
